chunk:
Evanhealy Blue Cactus Beauty Elixir

Brand: evanhealy

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Jojoba (Simmondsia chinensis) Seed Oil*, Prickly Pear (Opuntia ficus-indica) Seed Oil*, Blue Tansy (Tanacetum annuum) Flower Oil*, Sandalwood (Santalum paniculatum) Oil*, Ylang Ylang (Cananga odorata) Flower Oil*. *ORGANIC

Directions: Rythmic pressing onto skin of this oil together with a plant HydroSoul, helps the skin self-regulate.

Warnings: Store away from heat and light. If redness or irritation develops, discontinue use. Avoid contract with eyes. For external use only.

Warnings: Store away from heat and light. If redness or irritation develops, discontinue use. Avoid contract with eyes. For external use only.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
